# extraAttributes

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of additional attributes for a metadata item.

## Declaration

```swift
var extraAttributes: [AVMetadataExtraAttributeKey : Any]? { get }
```

## Discussion

Extra attributes, when they’re present, are specific to metadata container formats and keys in their associated key-spaces. For example, a metadata item can represent the “attached picture” frame defined by the ID3 tag specification with keyspace [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataKeySpace/id3] and key [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataKey/id3MetadataKeyAttachedPicture], a value that carries the image data, and extra attributes that include a description of the picture as carried in the ‘APIC’ frame of the ID3 tag.

## Accessing values

- **value**: The value of the metadata item.
- **stringValue**: The value of the metadata item as a string.
- **numberValue**: The value of the metadata item as a number.
- **dateValue**: The value of the metadata item as a date.
- **dataValue**: The value of the metadata item as a data value.

items.description: The value of the metadata item.
